articles.author: Nicole McCain
articles.title: Covid-19: SA records 1 931 new infections and 17 new deaths - News24
articles.description: South Africa recorded 1 931 new Covid-19 infections on Sunday, representing an 8.6% positivity rate.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 1 931 new cases of Covid-19 on Sunday.
  • Seventeen deaths were also recorded, bringing the death toll to 94 177.
  • Gauteng recorded 26% of the new cases.
